review:
She is very skilled, caring, gentle and helpful.

She took perfect care of me when I visited Opus and nicely explained me the entire process.

I had a smile while leaving Opus during my first, even though I have a dental phobia.

I thankful for her help.

Excellent service. Pleased to meet the doctors. Very motivating and made me feel completely comfortable on the dental chair despite my severe dental phobia. Very Cooperative & accommodating. Didn't  rush thru the process. Will definitely recommend them. Thank You Dr.Khan & Dr.Niraalee for baring me. Thank you for understanding my phobia.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she is very nice , friendly, and explains problems in detail...she makes patient at ease....and do her duties carefully under the guidance of Dr Burzin Khan Sir.....who supervises all the cases....

Very patient and explains the problem and solution very systematically.
Also always try's to save the tooth which I haven't seen in many other doctors.
Dr Niraalee shah did my treatment & I am very happy with it & I recommend to whoever wants to go for treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Nirali is an excellent doctor explain everything related to my teeth and cavity very well very friendly solve my problem very well
job was done with utmost care and precision.there was no pain or discomfort during the procedure.i recommend her

I m very happy how Dr  Niraalee treated me. She was friendly.  Listen to my problems patiently. Examined properly. Explained me nicely . Be patient with me. I m very happy with my experience . Thank you Doc.

review: Efficient team. Analysed the problem properly and explained the course of treatment in detail.While the junior doctor was doing the Job the Senior doctor monitored through out.

she is cooperative, understood the problem quickly,during her treatment u dont feel something is happening to your body or teeth, i mean very peaceful,i never felt at any point of time that she is in hurry, she is fully involved with the patient`s pain.
Dr Niraalee provided excellent service. The consultation, examination and whitening were each thorough and we'll explained. I'm am thrilled with the service and the results.
It was a good experience. Doctor was sweet and was keeping me updated on what her next step was. Would definitely recommend her to more people around.
